name: Brick House - Ciento Por Ciento - 2023 TAA Exclusive
additionalNotes: The Brick House Ciento Por Ciento is absolutely, 100% a Nicaraguan puro from filler to wrapper (Ciento Por Ciento is Spanish for 100%). The J.C. Newman Cigar Co. originally released the Brick House Ciento Por Ciento in Germany, but it is now being release in USA. However, the Brick House Ciento Por Ciento is available through members of the Tobacconists’ Association of America (TAA), and only 500 boxes of 25 cigars were produced.
